meaningMnemonic: Even something <kanji>dry</kanji> will <kanji>dry up</kanji> more if it's got <vocabulary>dehydration</vocabulary>. There's a lot of <vocabulary>dryness</vocabulary> going on here.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
